Mayor Tom Leppert 's statement: "The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval." Turns out the ceremony was the brainchild of Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway , a rebel key distributor.
